about_the_game:
Happy Quest : True Happy adds adult content to Happy Quest.
You will find two h-scenes in each Relationship meter and the in-game Gallery will show a nude version of each character.

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content.

All characters in the game are all over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
Happy Quest : True Happy adds adult content to Happy Quest.
You will find two h-scenes in each Relationship meter and the in-game Gallery will show a nude version of each character.
name: Happy Quest : True Happy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Happy Quest : True Happy adds adult content to Happy Quest.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
